#summary Alters editor actions on Ctrl[-Shift]-Left/Right

= Introduction =

This editor tool alters default editor actions on Ctrl-Left/Right and Ctrl-Shift-Left/Right: go to or select up to the next or previous word bound. New actions are similar to what many popular editors do.
